DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate several potential risk factor postoperative delirium cardiac surgery patient . The risk factor include use specific preoperative , intraoperative , and/or postoperative medication . Other risk factor investigate may include exposure cardiopulmonary bypass , surgical technique , duration surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors Delirium Following Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: In order understand role medication usage and/or cardiopulmonary bypass , investigator propose leverage perioperative data warehouse ( PDW ) , IRB approve data registry , retrospectively evaluate subject . All patient data available warehouse may include review . At time , approximately 750,000 patient PDW . All data access retrospectively patient see care Vanderbilt . The Vanderbilt Perioperative Information Management System ( VPIMS ) part integrate system cover entire perioperative process include instrument & supply management , scheduling , status display . Because extensive effort put toward in-house intraoperative software development , Vanderbilt Anesthesiology & Perioperative Informatics Research ( VAPIR ) Division able benefit availability thousand historical intraoperative record , contain detailed physiologic information . The PDW incorporate VPIMS electronic healthcare record ( EHR ) build database . In addition PDW , information Society Thoracic Surgeons ( STS ) database use study . The database use algorithms create programmer assistance clinician screen data ass accuracy completeness . Once data compound uploaded , variable screen outlier clinician . Outliers assess validated clinician base trend raw data . The following brief description investigator data analysis : - Categorical variable express frequency percentage . - Continuous variable report median interquartile range ( IQR ) . - investigator compare prevalence medication use incidence postoperative delirium adjust confounders . - Analysis initially complete adjust confounders , consider match patient propensity score base initial result . - Statistical significance ( pâ‰¤0.05 ) categorical variable compute use Fisher 's exact test chi-squared Deuchler-Wilcoxon procedure t-test continuous variable . - An iterative expectation-maximization ( EM ) algorithm consider account miss value form imputation method unless deletion miss data ideal .
